name: Viola
text:
[Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)
[On Play] Choose 1 of the following:
• Look at all of your opponent's life. Then return them in any order.
• Turn all of your life cards face down.

effect.text: After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.
Choose 1 of the following: • Look at all of your opponent's life. Then return them in any order. • Turn all of your life cards face down.
